name: Slime Time Beta 0.1
description:
Slime time is a game where you try to become the biggest slime without getting crushed by other slime and eat smaller cubes to get bigger.

Controls

aswd and Mouse to move around.

Note: This is a beta version so expect some bugs and issues.
